ROOT.record: select sysdate as icolhistory1,sysdate as icolhistory2,'增容换变压器' as icolhistory3 union all select sysdate as icolhistory1,sysdate as icolhistory2,'例行试验，本体检查，加装防坠落装置，加装电缆油箱下引管，小修，传动，清扫' as icolhistory3 union all select sysdate as icolhistory1,sysdate as icolhistory2,'例行试验，消防装置检查，本体检查，加装防坠落装置，刷相色，保护及自动化装置检查' as icolhistory3 union all select sysdate as icolhistory1,sysdate as icolhistory2,'101CT开仓检查、处缺，本体检查、处缺，小修、传动，清扫，消防装置检查、传动，主变排油注氮装置处缺。' as icolhistory3 union all select sysdate as icolhistory1,sysdate as icolhistory2,'调压箱取油样，直流电源切改，保护及自动化装置检查、增加事故总，主变110kV侧后备保护增加跳母联回路，改定值，执行定值' as icolhistory3 union all select sysdate as icolhistory1,sysdate as icolhistory2,'处理主变35kV侧B相套管渗油缺陷，更换主变自动灭火系统火灾探头。' as icolhistory3 union all select sysdate as icolhistory1,sysdate as icolhistory2,'#2机组B修' as icolhistory3
